TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerSerializationService

summary.span: 提供一个可调用序列化和反序列化的接口。

span.span: Provides an interface that can invoke serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此服务提供方法，以便将对象的集合转换为可序列化的对象，表示它们，从而将序列化数据转换为它所表示的对象。This service provides methods to convert a collection of objects to a serializable object that represents them, and to convert serialization data to the object or objects that it represents. 支持设计器的所有组件必须都支持每个组件的类型的序列的化。All components that support a designer must support serialization of each component's type. 在设计器扫描公共属性、 方法和每个类型的事件，并将它们的类型描述符中表示时，将发生这种情况。This occurs when the designer scans the public properties, methods, and events of each type and represents these within a type descriptor. 此接口使用扫描成员的技术将一个组件集合转换为支持运行时序列化的单个对象。This interface uses the technique of scanning members to convert a collection of components into a single object that supports run-time serialization. 这不一定能为属于的类的自定义类型的序列化。This does not necessarily provide for the serialization of custom types that belong to the class. 许多对象需要自定义序列化程序，以使它们在运行时序列化的值。Many objects require a custom serializer to have their values serialized at run time. 若要指定自定义类型的序列化程序，使用属性或实现。To specify a serializer for a custom type, use a attribute or implement an .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection Deserialize(object serializationData) cil managed
Public Function Deserialize (serializationData As Object) As ICollection

param.name: serializationData
param.span: 包含序列化的数据的对象。

span.span: An object consisting of serialized data.

summary.span: 反序列化指定的序列化数据对象并返回由这些数据表示的对象的集合。

span.span: Deserializes the specified serialization data object and returns a collection of objects represented by that data.

returns.span: 从指定的序列化数据对象重新生成的对象的 。

span.span: An of objects rebuilt from the specified serialization data object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Serialize(class System.Collections.ICollection objects) cil managed
Public Function Serialize (objects As ICollection) As Object

param.name: objects
param.span: 要序列化的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects to serialize.

summary.span: 序列化指定的对象集合并将其存储在序列化数据对象中。

span.span: Serializes the specified collection of objects and stores them in a serialization data object.

returns.span: 包含指定的对象集合的序列化状态的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the serialized state of the specified collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的对象完全支持运行时序列化。The returned object fully supports run-time serialization. 从此方法返回的对象包含实时引用集合中的对象。The object returned from this method contains live references to objects in the collection. 然后，可以将此对象传递到任何运行时序列化机制。This object can then be passed to any run-time serialization mechanism. 对象本身将组件序列化为相同的方式设计器为其写入源，通过将存储它们的状态属性的属性。The object itself serializes components the same way designers write source for them, by storing their state, property by property.
